heroSection.title: Hi there
heroSection.subtitle: Developing more than just websites — creating experiences.

aboutSection.introduction: As a developer, I, Vitor Hugo, am driven by innovation and the constant pursuit of more efficient solutions. I have a passion for exploring new technologies, from modern frameworks to best development practices, to create robust and high-performance websites.
aboutSection.description: Currently, I focus on creating scalable and efficient solutions. I enjoy learning and applying new technologies, always focused on building systems that meet user needs and are sustainable in the long term. I aim to deliver clean, maintainable code and contribute to impactful projects.

technologist.degree: Technologist's Degree in in Systems Analysis and Development

worksSection.title: A developer focused on innovation and user-centric solutions.
worksSection.subtitle: My journey started with a passion for solving complex problems through code and creating seamless digital experiences.

docsite.title: DocSite
docsite.description: An open source technical documentation platform for data structures with responsive design and advanced search.
docsite.longDescription: DocSite is an open source solution focused on providing clear and accessible technical documentation for data structures. With responsive design and advanced search functionality, DocSite facilitates navigation and understanding of complex concepts, making it an essential tool for developers and programming students.
docsite.challenges: Implement an efficient search system and create an intuitive navigation structure to facilitate access to information.

rfsacadas.title: RF Sacadas
rfsacadas.description: Institutional landing page for company specialized in glass balconies, with conversion focus.
rfsacadas.longDescription: Development of a modern and optimized institutional website for RF Sacadas, a company focused on glass balcony solutions. The project focused on creating a visual experience that converts visitors into customers, while ensuring excellent performance and optimized SEO to improve the company's online visibility.
rfsacadas.challenges: Create a design that conveys trust and quality, while optimizing the site for lead conversion.

meuchadigital.title: Meu Chá Digital
meuchadigital.description: Complete digital platform for organizing baby showers and weddings.
meuchadigital.longDescription: A fullstack application that revolutionizes how people organize their baby showers and weddings. The platform offers complete tools for creating digital invitations, gift lists, RSVP confirmation and much more.
meuchadigital.challenges: Integrate real-time PIX payment system and create a smooth experience for both organizers and guests.

loquei.title: Loquei
loquei.description: Android app for renting various items between users.
loquei.longDescription: Loquei is an innovative mobile app that connects people who want to rent items with those who have these items available. A sustainable solution that promotes conscious consumption and collaborative economy.
loquei.challenges: Implement a trust system between users and optimize the mobile experience for different devices.

forumpb.title: Forum.pb
forumpb.description: Modern forum with authentication system, posts, comments and likes.
forumpb.longDescription: A complete forum developed with modern technologies, offering a rich experience for online community. Includes authentication system, post creation, comments, likes and content moderation.
forumpb.challenges: Create a secure authentication system and implement interactive features like likes and real-time comments.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Modern administrative dashboard with interactive charts and metrics.
dashboard.longDescription: A complete dashboard for data analysis and administration, with interactive visualizations and responsive design. Perfect for tracking business metrics and making data-driven decisions.
dashboard.challenges: Optimize performance for large data volumes and create visualizations that were both informative and aesthetically pleasing.

question1.question: What types of development projects do you specialize in?
question1.answer: I specialize in full-stack web development and mobile app development, tailored to meet your specific needs.

question2.question: What technologies do you use for development?
question2.answer: I work with a variety of technologies including React, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, AWS for cloud services, and databases like PostgreSQL to build scalable and efficient applications.

question3.question: How do I start a development project with you?
question3.answer: You can start by reaching out via the contact form or email. We'll discuss your project's goals, timeline, and technical requirements, and I'll provide a tailored proposal.

question4.question: Do you provide ongoing support after the project is completed?
question4.answer: Yes! I offer post-launch support for bug fixes, updates, and ongoing improvements to ensure the continued success of your application.
